prompt:
You are a medical consultation expert.
Your task is to create NEW medical consultation Q&A pairs that follow the same format and style as the examples below.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Generate COMPLETELY NEW scenarios (not copies of examples)
2. Match the format, style, and quality exactly as shown in the examples
3. Provide clear, detailed doctor responses
4. Cover different medical topics if possible

EXAMPLES (study the format carefully):

================================================================================
Example 1:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: how to reduce the pain due to ankle sprain

PATIENT: hi doctor I have chronic ankle sprains in both the ankles I have this for maybe a year now I went to it and have been doing exercises but about a week ago my ankle began to pop it is happening once in a while it really hurts and I have to pause for a couple minutes for the pain to settle is this normal is there a way for me to prevent or calm this pain I am taking zoloft and ibuprofen when needed please help

DOCTOR: hi hope this message finds you in good health I have gone through your complaints and understand your concern for further information consult an orthopaedician and traumatologist online

STATUS: low severity

================================================================================
Example 2:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: what is the life expectancy in case of mutinous cystadenoma

PATIENT: hi doctor I am 31 years old and weigh about 54 keg I underwent appendix operation before four years and the histopathology came as appendix with mutinous cystadenoma after a few months I started getting stomach pain and constipation and doctors used to give me stool softners my stomach pain became severe before two years and I got admitted to the hospital they did a colonoscopy and said everything is normal but my problem did not go off recently again I got admitted in the hospital due to severe pain and they did right hemicolectomy and said I have a mutinous carcinoma and it is not curable only death can be postponed by giving treatment kindly advice and help me

DOCTOR: hi I have read your query and seen the attached files but nowhere is it documented that it is mutinous carcinoma and that it has spread the uploaded colonoscopy was not done recently what was done after that till now please upload all the doctors notes and recent investigation reports for thorough advice

STATUS: high severity

================================================================================
Example 3:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: how does color blindness occur

PATIENT: hi doctor can color blindness gets generated by means of other issue or problem except birth is there any remedy for it

DOCTOR: hi for further information consult an eye care ophthalmologist online

STATUS: low severity

================================================================================
NOW: Generate a NEW unique medical consultation scenario following the EXACT same format above:

DESCRIPTION: [brief medical question]
PATIENT: [detailed patient narrative]
DOCTOR: [clear, detailed medical advice - write naturally, don't worry about formatting]
STATUS: [low severity / medium severity / high severity]

Generate ONLY the new scenario, no meta-commentary.
api_response:
DESCRIPTION: persistent cough after respiratory infection

PATIENT: hi doctor I had a bad flu about three weeks ago with fever and body aches that lasted five days now the fever is gone but I have this dry cough that won't stop it gets worse at night and sometimes I wake up coughing I've been using over the counter cough syrup but it only helps for a few hours I don't smoke and have no history of asthma should I be concerned about this lingering cough or is it normal after an infection

DOCTOR: hi thank you for sharing your symptoms this sounds like post-viral cough which is common after respiratory infections the airways can remain inflamed and sensitive for several weeks I recommend trying steam inhalation and staying well-hydrated if the cough persists beyond 8 weeks or you develop shortness of breath chest pain or colored phlegm please consult a pulmonologist for further evaluation

STATUS: low severity

parsed_scenario.Patient: hi doctor I had a bad flu about three weeks ago with fever and body aches that lasted five days now the fever is gone but I have this dry cough that won't stop it gets worse at night and sometimes I wake up coughing I've been using over the counter cough syrup but it only helps for a few hours I don't smoke and have no history of asthma should I be concerned about this lingering cough or is it normal after an infection
parsed_scenario.Doctor: hi thank you for sharing your symptoms this sounds like post-viral cough which is common after respiratory infections the airways can remain inflamed and sensitive for several weeks I recommend trying steam inhalation and staying well-hydrated if the cough persists beyond 8 weeks or you develop shortness of breath chest pain or colored phlegm please consult a pulmonologist for further evaluation
